channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024060278
item.description:
Report X-2024060278

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-18T15:12:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-03
  • City: PHX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024060278, X-2024060279, X-2024060280: AWB 70185334 was tendered with undeclared DG. Shipment contained 4 boxes of shotgun ammunition, 1 package of lighters, and one Lithium Ion Battery Packed With Equipment (140Wh). Items would have been transported on a passenger aircraft.

item.title: Report X-2024060463
item.description:
Report X-2024060463

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-13T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-31
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE IN FULL PPE TO DOOR TO FIND THE DECLARED HAZMAT SITTING OUTSIDE OF THE TRAILER DOOR SITTING ON A CART WITH A VISIBLE LEAK. THE EMPLOYEE HAD ONLY NOTICED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AFTER HE HAD MOVED IT OUT OF THE TRAILER. THE RESPONDER MOVED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INTO A SPILL TRAY AND ABSORBED ANY REMAINING SPILL BEFORE PLACING THE SPILL TRAY ONTO THE CART AND RETURNING TO THE PSC.
